title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When updating the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature, there is no visual indication of the ongoing process, causing confusion for users.
EB: A busy cursor should be displayed during the update process to indicate that the system is working. Currently, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table.
SR:
1. Open the Export Zip feature.
2. Check or uncheck one or more checkboxes.
3. Observe the lack of a busy cursor during the update process, and note the significant delay in reflecting the changes.
